releases.summary: Repository-aware identity management with workspaces and diagnostics

features.title: Workspace command
features.description: Create organized folders for each identity with automatic binding. All repos cloned within a workspace folder automatically use that identity.

features.title: Repo-bound identity
features.description: Bind specific repositories to an identity. The binding persists regardless of global active user.

features.title: Status command
features.description: View current identity, repository binding status, configured workspaces, and detect mismatches at a glance.

features.title: Doctor diagnostics
features.description: Troubleshoot SSH keys, permissions, git config, and connectivity issues with actionable fix suggestions.

releases.summary: Initial release with core identity management

features.title: Add identities
features.description: Add new Git identities with SSH key generation or import.

features.title: Switch identities
features.description: Switch between configured identities with a single command.

features.title: List identities
features.description: View all configured identities and see which one is active.

features.title: Clone with identity
features.description: Clone repositories using the correct SSH configuration for the active identity.

features.title: Remote management
features.description: Fix or restore repository remote URLs for identity-aware SSH access.

features.title: Sync validation
features.description: Validate that Git and SSH configs match the active user.

features.title: Safe uninstall
features.description: Cleanly remove bgit while restoring all repositories to standard GitHub URLs.

features.title: Cross-platform support
features.description: Works on Linux, macOS, and Windows with platform-specific handling.
